ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: From creativity to all kinds of mental heuristics and biases to formation of concepts, this course covered a very broad range of important topics in psychology.
A much better understanding of the brain and its trappings.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Professor Ahn is a very good lecturer, and the discussion sections were very engaging even though the course was over Zoom.
I think it was a very interesting and informative course. Perhaps the material was too much for a 5-week summer session, but I'm sure this is not the case in a normal year.

Prof. Ahn is a good, clear prof but on a personal level she leaves no room for flexibility. DO NOT MISS A CLASS. That being said, the quizzes came straight from lectures and the exams came straight from the discussion questions. Both exams are fair if you thoroughly review the answers to the discussion questions.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: I would! Very interesting and fun.

If you're able to really commit the several hours a week to focus on watching her lectures and taking extensive notes then yes, you will learn a lot from this course. But be warned, it is not an easy A if you are not focused.

narratives.question_text: The Canvas course site allowed me to identify and access required course materials easily.
How will you use the knowledge and skills you learned in this course in your future endeavors?
comments: It has provided me a broad range of topics within cognitive psychology, and I would like to explore a couple of topics in depth, which I discovered with this course.
It truly changed the way I approach conversations and made me more sensitive to my mindset and how I perceive interactions.
